result.title: 2012 - 2014 Centre for Environment, Fisheries & Aquaculture Science (Cefas) Swallow Sands Marine Conservation Zone (MCZ) Survey Data
result.name: 2012-2014-centre-for-environment-fisheries-aquaculture-science-cefas-swallow-sands-marine-conse
result.notes:
Two surveys of Swallow Sands rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015):

Cruise: Cefas_cend0812

Date: 16th May - 22nd May 2012

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): Transits Only

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Transits Only

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 37 video transects; 556 stills analysed

PSA Samples to date: 103

Infauna Samples to date: 103

Cruise: Cefas_Cend0514

Date: 13th March - 30th March 2014

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): Tracklines only

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Tracklines only

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 15 video transects; 206 stills

PSA Samples to date: 65

Infauna Samples to date: 65

organization.description: The Centre for Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture Science (Cefas) is a world leader in marine science and technology, providing innovative solutions for the aquatic environment, biodiversity and food security.
